name: '6th Sense' - Game-A-Week 'Tactile' Experience Prototype
description: This is my Week 2 Game-A-Week project, focusing on the theme on tactile. I decided to explore the reverse of this theme and therefore what you would do if there was a lack of your senses. Sound is an important aspect of our everyday lives and within the gaming world. I experimented with how a person can use sound to visually feel there surrounding environment. This simulation will express this idea, while shooting a competitive aspect your way.
